statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, reward_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_date FROM loyalty_program WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE start_date < '2021-12-31' AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_program WHERE program_name LIKE '%Gold%';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, reward_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, end_date FROM loyalty_program WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY reward_points DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_program WHERE program_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points <= 50;
SELECT name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY point_cost DESC;
SELECT reward_name, point_cost FROM rewards WHERE point_cost < 50;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%John%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';

SELECT name, email, loyalty_points FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.loyalty_points >= rewards.point_cost WHERE rewards.availability = TRUE ORDER BY rewards.point_cost ASC, customers.loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points <= 50 OR loyalty_points >= 200 ORDER BY loyalty_points ASC, name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email, loyalty_points AS points_available FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points < 50 OR email NOT LIKE '%yahoo.com' ORDER BY email ASC, points_available DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, customer_id FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE required_points > 50;
SELECT reward_name, required_points FROM rewards;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE required_points < 500;
SELECT customer_name, reward_name, transaction_date FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id JOIN rewards r ON t.reward_id = r.reward_id;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(required_points) AS total_required_points FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id JOIN rewards r ON t.reward_id = r.reward_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM Rewards;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM Rewards WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, customer_id, reward_id FROM Transactions WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM LoyaltyProgram;
SELECT * FROM Rewards WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT R.reward_name, C.customer_name, T.transaction_date FROM Rewards R JOIN Transactions T ON R.reward_id = T.reward_id JOIN Customers C ON T.customer_id = C.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_programs WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT reward_name, required_points FROM rewards ORDER BY required_points DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT reward_name, required_points FROM rewards ORDER BY required_points DESC;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM chatbot_messages WHERE customer_id = 2002 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
